EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to Luxury Presence!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Welcome to Luxury Presence! We're thrilled to have the opportunity to work together and help elevate your digital presence.
Shortly, you will receive an invitation to our platform, which will allow you to start the onboarding process and begin creating your brand-new website. To ensure a seamless experience, we have assigned a dedicated Onboarding Specialist,{!Account.Implementation_Manager__c}, who will be your main point of contact throughout your onboarding journey.
Please feel free to reach out to your assigned Onboarding Specialist if you need any assistance. They are here to provide support and ensure that everything runs smoothly for you.
We will only start working on the buildout of your website upon the completion of your onboarding modules.
Timeline of Process
Please accept the invite within 48 hrs Please complete the onboarding modules within the next 3 days We’ll get to work building your new website! Your Onboarding Specialist will schedule a call to review the draft of your website within 5 days after you complete onboarding ​
Should you have any further inquiries, please don't hesitate to ask. I'm always available to help. ​ As a thank you for partnering up with Luxury Presence, I wanted to let you know about our lucrative referral program. If you refer LP to another agent who signs up with us, you will receive a $1,200 credit applied to your account. Link to referral form --> Click here!
Best regards, {!User.FirstName}
